title: Managing Social Presence and Cognitive Load in Online Science Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Project-based science learning in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment. Aims to balance learner interaction and cognitive load.

learning_goals: Learners can perform trust-based communication with peers at a frequency of 80% or higher using online collaboration tools
Learners achieve performance of 3.0 or higher on a 4-point scale in social presence indicators (response speed, feedback quality) during weekly project execution
Learners maintain a self-assessment score of 4.0 or higher on a 5-point scale for cognitive load when applying complex scientific concepts to project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
